title: Call Endpoints from Flutter
description: Write Flutter code to call Serverpod endpoints and handle responses.
instructions:
Write a ProductService class in Flutter that:

1. Has a constructor accepting a Client instance
2. Implements fetchAllProducts() that calls client.product.getAllProducts()
3. Implements fetchProduct(int id) that gets a single product
4. Implements createProduct(String name, double price) that creates a new product
5. Handles errors and returns appropriate results

Use try-catch for error handling.

hints.text: Store the Client in a final field and accept it in the constructor
The client has properties matching endpoint names: client.product, client.user, etc.
Create Product objects before sending to createProduct endpoint

commonMistakes.mistake: Not handling exceptions from server calls
commonMistakes.correction: Wrap endpoint calls in try-catch and handle errors appropriately
